as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild

asChild.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
Read our Composition guide for more details.
asChild.description_zh:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
Read our Composition guide for more details.

autoSaveId.description: Unique id used to auto-save group arrangement via localStorage.
autoSaveId.description_zh: Unique id used to auto-save group arrangement via localStorage.

id.description: Group id; falls back to useId when not provided.
id.description_zh: Group id; falls back to useId when not provided.

keyboardResizeBy.description: Step size when arrow key was pressed.
keyboardResizeBy.description_zh: Step size when arrow key was pressed.

storage.description: Custom storage API; defaults to localStorage
storage.description_zh: Custom storage API; defaults to localStorage

events.name: layout
events.description: Event handler called when group layout changes
events.description_zh: Event handler called when group layout changes

slots.name: layout
slots.description:
payload: number[]
Current size of layout
